meta.title: PushShare - Push Notification Sharing Service
meta.description: PushShare - Easily share push notifications across multiple devices

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.intro:
PushShare ("PushShare", "we", "us", or "our") provides a service that forwards device notifications to your registered devices.

We respect your privacy and collect only the minimum information necessary to operate our service.

By using PushShare, you agree to this Privacy Policy.

section2.title: 2. Information We Collect
section2.intro:
PushShare collects only metadata required for device registration and notification forwarding.

We do not collect the contents of notifications or any sensitive personal data.

subsection1.title: 2.1 Device Information
subsection1.intro: When you register a device, we collect:
subsection1.items:
• Device ID (auto-generated identifier)
  • Device name
  • Device brand (e.g., Apple, Samsung)
  • Device model (e.g., iPhone 15 Pro, SM-A146P)
subsection1.note: This information allows you to manage and distinguish your registered devices.

subsection2.title: 2.2 Notification Routing Information
subsection2.intro: To deliver notifications between devices, we collect:
subsection2.note: These identifiers are used solely to route notifications and are not used for any other purpose.

subsection3.title: 2.3 Subscription Information
subsection3.intro: To manage your subscription status, we store only:
subsection3.note:
We do not store payment information, transaction IDs, receipts, or billing details.
Subscription validation is handled securely through RevenueCat, and PushShare stores only the resulting subscription status.

subsection4.title: 2.4 Account Information
subsection4.intro:
When you sign in, you provide an email address to Firebase Authentication.

PushShare does not store your email address in our database.

We store only your Firebase Authentication user ID, which is also used as your RevenueCat customer identifier.

subsection5.title: 2.5 No Notification Content Storage
subsection5.intro:
PushShare does not store any content of your notifications (such as messages, senders, or app data).

Notifications are forwarded in real time without being saved.

section3.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
section3.intro: We use the collected information only to:
section3.items:
• Register and identify your devices
  • Forward notifications between devices
  • Verify and maintain subscription status
  • Improve service stability and performance
  • Diagnose and resolve technical issues
section3.note: We do not use your data for marketing, profiling, or advertising.

section4.title: 4. Data Retention
section4.intro:
We retain your data only for as long as needed to provide our service.

When you delete your account, all associated device information and stored identifiers are permanently removed, except for information required for marketplace billing records.

section5.title: 5. Third-Party Services
section5.intro: PushShare uses the following service providers:
section5.items:
• Firebase Authentication ‚Äî user sign-in
  • Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) ‚Äî notification delivery
  • Firebase Firestore ‚Äî device metadata storage
  • RevenueCat ‚Äî subscription validation
section5.note: We do not sell or share your data with third parties for advertising.

section6.title: 6. International Data Transfers
section6.intro:
Your data may be processed on servers located outside your country.

By using PushShare, you consent to such transfers.

section7.title: 7. Security
section7.intro:
We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information.

However, no method of transmission or storage is completely secure.

section8.title: 8. Your Rights
section8.items:
• Access to your data
  • Correction or deletion
  • Withdrawal of consent
  • A copy of your data (where legally applicable)
section8.note: Contact us using the details below to exercise your rights.

section9.title: 9. Children's Privacy
section9.intro:
PushShare is not designed for children.

We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

section10.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
section10.intro:
We may update this Privacy Policy periodically.

Significant changes will be announced within the app or on our website.
